name: Keep Driving (Coopah)
description: Keep Drivin is set in a futuristic 80's world where you play as Dave, an average guy going about his average day, driving his AI DeLorean (HU3) down the highway until it starts going on the fritz and glitching out. HU3 can’t stop so it’s up to Dave to keep driving. Players must battle between virus' appearing on their windscreen and not crashing the car they are driving. Complete simple tasks to keep your view clear but ignore them and it won’t be so easy to see where you’re going.
